game_stats module

class game_stats.game_stats

Bases: object

static class of gamestats so everywhere can be accessed

game_data

Dicstionary : contains all the game

__start_time

int : start of the game in secconds since 1.1.1970

__end_time

int : end of the game in secconds since 1.1.1970

__end_time = None
__start_time = None
add_played_time()

Add currently played time to played time in game stats. Also added to Game_Data Database

create_gamedata()

Loads gamestats from json file. If no file exists, set game_stats to standard game stats

game_data = None
save_stats()

Saves game stats to json File

set_player_position()

Sets current player position to game stats

Parameters

level (level.Level) – level the player is currently in
